name: Great Mandrake
description: The Great Mandrake is a small, sturdy plant creature that emits a powerful and damaging shriek.
memorable: Its devastating shriek can stun or knock unconscious foes, making it a significant tactical threat.
goals: To defend itself and incapacitate intruders with its shriek.
relations: May be encountered in wooded areas or alongside other plant creatures.
strengths: Immunities to poison damage and the poisoned condition enhance its resilience in combat.
weaknesses: Weaker dexterity hampers its defense and agility.
attacks: Can use multiattack to make two bites that deal piercing damage or unleash a shriek that inflicts thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: The shriek ability can incapacitate enemies and control the battlefield.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect movement in that radius.
additional_information: Constitution score of 16 makes it very resilient.
Strength score of 14 enhances its physical attacks.
Shriek can potentially stun or knock unconscious.
Can detect movement despite being blind beyond its tremorsense range.
Low dexterity may leave it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
test_queries: sturdy plant with thunder damage ability
monster that stuns enemies with a shriek
resilient plant creature immune to poison
